aptitude-subjects.name: Number Systems
aptitude-subjects.description: Basic concepts of numbers, operations, and properties

lessons.title: Natural Numbers
lessons.description: Understanding natural numbers and their properties
lessons.content: Natural numbers are positive integers starting from 1. They include 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and so on.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a natural number?
questions.explanation: Natural numbers start from 1, so 0 is not included.

questions.question: What is the sum of first 5 natural numbers?

lessons.title: Prime Numbers
lessons.description: Understanding prime numbers and their identification
lessons.content: A prime number is a natural number greater than 1 that has no positive divisors other than 1 and itself.

questions.question: Which of the following is a prime number?
questions.explanation: 7 is only divisible by 1 and 7, making it prime.

aptitude-subjects.name: Analogies
aptitude-subjects.description: Understanding relationships between words and concepts

lessons.title: Word Analogies
lessons.description: Finding relationships between pairs of words
lessons.content: Analogies test your ability to see relationships between words or concepts.

questions.question: Book : Author :: Painting : ?
questions.explanation: Just as a book is created by an author, a painting is created by an artist.

lessons.title: Short Passages
lessons.content: Reading comprehension involves understanding the main idea, details, and inferences from text.

questions.question: Based on the passage: 'The sun provides energy for all life on Earth through photosynthesis.' What is the main source of energy for life?
questions.explanation: The passage clearly states that the sun provides energy for all life on Earth.
